relation.text: AT THE Sessions in the Old bayly , Sep. 9th 1674
a long time been more thronged , nor a greater Goal-delivery been known
two days after to a Rag-Shop , being next Door , he was taken
now at the Bar he Pleaded
took one of them , which was the Prisoner now
persisted therein for a long time
burnt in the hand , and some by Transportation , amongst which there were two Boys that were Brothers both by nature and in wickedness , one not above eleven years
years . There was eight in all burnt in the Hand , six ordered
